description:
Serval and Caracal follow the trail of Kyururu, who`s been abducted by someone. They find out that Giant Pangolin and Giant Armadillo were behind the abduction and question them until they finally find out where Kyururu is: a place where many humans were once said to live. And then they meet the Friend who requested Kyururu`s abduction...
Source: crunchyroll
